revised_title: Semidiurnal Tides of Port Leopold: Arctic Seas Tides Research Part II
tldr: This study investigates the semidiurnal tides of Port Leopold in North Somerset, providing calculations for the eccentricity of the moon's orbit, solitidal and lunitidal intervals, and the ratio of solar to lunar coefficients. The author also estimates the depth of the Atlantic based on tidal theories, suggesting a depth of 3.529 miles from semidiurnal tidal intervals.
